response.overview: A mindf*ck experimental short film where two films play in split screen. On the left is a western where a bounty hunter attempts to kill her boss. On the right is a sci-fi about a spaceship technician with a difficult home life.
response.tagline: A MULTITUDE OF STUDIES HAVE CONCLUDED IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO TRULY MULTITASK. THEREFORE, THE FOLLOWING FILM IS IMPOSSIBLE TO WATCH.
response.title: A Tale in Two Parts
